QuestData.Title: Saurfang Will be Pleased
QuestData.Description: The portal is ready!$B$BIt's not powerful enough to transport an army, but we can maintain the connection long enough to allow important individuals to pass back and forth.$B$BSaurfang will want to know about our progress here. Walk through the portal to Orgrimmar, then deliver the news him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the portal in Dragonmaw Port to go to Orgrimmar and report to High Overlord Saurfang.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Use the portal in Dragonmaw Port to go to Orgrimmar and report to High Overlord Saurfang.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah, $c, you've returned from Dragonmaw. The portal is fully operational then? Good.
Before you return we have things that need to be cleaned up here first. Dirty things....
